articles.title: The U.S. ready to make up, Europe ready to break up in Munich - NPR
articles.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio tried to reassure Europe at the Munich Security Conference, but European leaders are skeptical.
articles.content: MUNICH After last year's lecture on free speech and democracy from Vice President Vance that left many European leaders shocked, the expectations for a follow-up by Secretary of State Marco Rubio at … [+4934 chars]
